toothSegmentationError.title: Tooth Segmentation Error
toothSegmentationError.message: Unable to identify teeth accurately. This may be caused by missing teeth in the scan.

occlusalPlaneError.title: Occlusal Plane Error
occlusalPlaneError.message: Unable to generate occlusal plane. This may be caused by missing molars or incisors.

hollowingError.title: Hollowing Error
hollowingError.message: An error occurred while hollowing out model.

pillarGenerationError.title: Pillar Generation Error
pillarGenerationError.message: An error occurred while generating model pillars.

ventGenerationError.title: Vent Generation Error
ventGenerationError.message: An error occurred while placing model vents.

textGenerationWarning.title: Text Placement Warning
textGenerationWarning.message: Text label was not able to be generated for the model.

textTruncationWarning.title: Text Truncation Warning
textTruncationWarning.message: Text has been truncated due to exceeding maximum length.
